message.body: Hey can you do me a favor if you have time? I'm moving to NYC and applying for an IT job at a university up there. Can you write me a letter of recommendation?
Uh. When do you need it by? I'm a bit busy with moving this week.
You have one from Pete too, right?
Asap, but if you dont have time it's nbd. Pete is writing one yes
Pete and now you are the only 2 people to know
I'll try to get one to you within the week.
Thanks a lot I appreciate it
